message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this fantastic product with you. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. As we're starting the negotiation, I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000. This is a great starting point, and I'm open to discussing further.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. This product looks great, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me right now.  Would you be willing to come down to $9,000?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand that $12,000 is a bit high for you, but I'm still confident that this product will bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10,500. This is a competitive price, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to get this product at a discounted rate.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway.  $10,500 is still a bit high for my budget. Would you consider $9,750? I'm eager to make this work.

Hi Bob, I understand that $9,750 is still a bit high for you, but I'm not willing to go much lower. However, I'm willing to make a slight adjustment. I can offer it to you for $10,200. This is a one-time offer, and I think it's a great compromise considering the value this product will bring to your business.
Hi Alice, thanks for sticking with this negotiation.  I'm willing to increase my offer to $9,900. Let me know if that works for you, as I think this would be a fair compromise.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to increase your offer. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product at $9,900. I'm willing to meet you halfway between my previous offer and your new offer. I can offer it to you for $10,550. This is my final compromise, and I hope you'll consider it.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $10,550 is still a bit too high for me. To be honest, I'm getting close to my limit. I can offer $10,000. This is a strong offer, and I believe it's a fair deal for both of us.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're getting close to your limit, and I appreciate your honesty. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product at $10,000. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $10,250. This is my final offer, and I hope you'll consider it.
